metadata.description: Official plugin marketplace for The Cat Toolkit - Vibecoding plugins for autonomous AI development.

plugins.name: planner
plugins.description: Hierarchical project planning (BRIEF/ROADMAP) and autonomous execution using the Orchestrator-Executor pattern.

plugins.name: context
plugins.description: Session state management and scratchpad pattern for avoiding context overflow and enabling session handoffs.

plugins.name: meta
plugins.description: The Toolkit Builder: Create skills, agents, commands, and hooks for plugin development.

plugins.name: guard
plugins.description: The Immune System: File safety warnings, security checks, and type-checking hooks for Vibecoding safety.

plugins.name: engineer
plugins.description: The 'muscle' that executes code changes, debugging, TDD, refactoring, security auditing, and git operations.

plugins.name: architect
plugins.description: The System Designer: Comprehensive system architecture, design patterns, and technical decision documentation.

plugins.name: think
plugins.description: Mental models and thinking frameworks for structured problem analysis and decision-making. No code execution.

plugins.name: prompter
plugins.description: Prompt engineering, meta-prompting, and prompt chain orchestration for AI-to-AI workflows.
